diagnostic.name: BsjLexerDiagnostic

prop.name: character
prop.desc: the character which caused this diagnostic

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic which acts as a supertype for all BSJ lexer diagnostics.

diagnostic.name: GeneralLexerFailureDiagnostic
diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic indicating a general lexer failure.

diagnostic.name: BsjParserDiagnostic

prop.name: ruleName
prop.desc: the rule which caused this diagnostic

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic which acts as the parent for all parser diagnostics.

diagnostic.name: ConflictingAccessModifierDiagnostic

prop.name: firstModifier
prop.desc: the first modifier which conflicts

prop.name: secondModifier
prop.desc: the second modifier which conflicts

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic which represents a conflicting access modifier.

diagnostic.name: ConflictingModeDiagnostic

prop.name: firstMode
prop.desc: the first mode which conflicts

prop.name: secondMode
prop.desc: the second mode which conflicts

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic which represents a conflicting metaprogram mode.

diagnostic.name: DuplicateModeDiagnostic

prop.name: mode
prop.desc: the mode which was duplicated

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing a duplicated metaprogram mode.

diagnostic.name: DuplicateModifierDiagnostic

prop.name: modifier
prop.desc: the modifier which was duplicated

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing a duplicated modifier.

diagnostic.name: ExtraneousTokenDiagnostic

prop.name: extraneousType
prop.desc: the type of the extraneous token

prop.name: extraneousToken
prop.desc: the text of the extraneous token

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing the presence of an extraneous token.

diagnostic.name: FloatingPointLiteralTooLargeDiagnostic
diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic indicating that a floating point literal was too large to fit into its type.

diagnostic.name: FloatingPointLiteralTooSmallDiagnostic
diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic indicating that a floating point literal was too small to fit into its type.

diagnostic.name: GeneralParseFailureDiagnostic

prop.name: tokenType
prop.desc: the type of the token where the errors started

prop.name: tokenText
prop.desc: the text of the token where the errors started

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing a general parsing failure starting at a given location.

diagnostic.name: InvalidFloatingPointLiteralDiagnostic

prop.name: literalText
prop.desc: the text of the invalid literal

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing an invalid floating point literal.

diagnostic.name: InvalidIntegerLiteralDiagnostic

prop.name: literalText
prop.desc: the text of the invalid literal

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing an invalid floating point literal.

diagnostic.name: InvalidModifierDiagnostic

prop.name: modifier
prop.desc: the modifier which was used incorrectly

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing an invalid modifier (a modifier which appeared in an incorrect context).

diagnostic.name: InvalidModeDiagnostic

prop.name: mode
prop.desc: the invalid mode

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing an invalid metaprogram mode. Because metaprogram modes are identifiers and not keywords, use of an incorrect mode (one which is parseable as a keyword but has no BSJ meaning) is reported through this type of diagnostic rather than a typical parse failure.

diagnostic.name: MissingTokenDiagnostic

prop.name: tokenType
prop.desc: the type of the missing token

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing a missing token.

diagnostic.name: UnexpectedTokenDiagnostic

prop.name: tokenType
prop.desc: the type of the token which was found

prop.name: tokenText
prop.desc: the text of the token which was found

prop.name: expectedType
prop.desc: the type of the expected token

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing the presence of one token where another was expected.

diagnostic.name: UnqualifiedSingleStaticImportNameDiagnostic

prop.name: name
prop.desc: the name which was provided

diagnostic.doc: A diagnostic representing a single static import which used an unqualified name.
